price: When you recite the Qur’an, We place between you and those who do not believe in the Hereafter an invisible barrier[40].
arabic: وَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ جَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ حِجَابٗا مَّسۡتُورٗا
footnotes: [40] Preventing guidance from them, for their aversion.
